caption: Performance
description: Defines performance metrics and attributes for multi-agent applications, focusing on load distribution, controllability, discovery, error handling, and system-level efficiency.
name: performance

load_distribution.caption: Load Distribution
load_distribution.description: Measures how computational and operational workloads are distributed across agents to ensure balanced resource utilization and prevent bottlenecks.

controllability.caption: Controllability
controllability.description: Evaluates the ability to manage and control the behavior of agents in the system, ensuring predictable and efficient operations.

discovery.caption: Discovery
discovery.description: Tracks the efficiency and accuracy of discovering agents, services, or resources within the multi-agent system.

errors.caption: Errors
errors.description: Monitors the frequency, types, and impact of errors encountered during multi-agent operations, enabling proactive issue resolution.

system_level.caption: System-Level
system_level.description: Analyzes the overall performance of the multi-agent system, including throughput, latency, and scalability metrics.
